tweet: @simonhoward There's no way on earth that match should have started.  Then again the referee didn't appear to be on this planet either.
@trimmtrab Yes, but texting in driving rain while trying to film the match as well does make things a tad more difficult.
But we won and avoided the potential banana skin of losing our unbeaten run to the team at the bottom of the table.
There wasn't much to update about anyway.  The game was crap and shouldn't have started as a large percentage of the pitch was under water.
Apologies for not tweeting from today's game.  Fingers were too cold to operate the keypad properly.
